TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_miduhepit_i_sinkicu_a_gang, title = miduhepit_i_sinkicu_a_gang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/miduhepit_i_sinkicu_a_gang} }

S.FORM: == miduhepit i sinkicu a gang神經膠質瘤 == miduhepit i sinkicu a gang, u teban nu singkicu a lebawa nu imelang, namaka sinkic sinuliay nu si-paw a nikasumad nu adada. miduhepit i singkicu a gang hina tahekal i tangah " pangangan han tu tangah miduhepit i sinkicu a gang, nika tahekal i dumaan nu singkicuan, mahida u namaka mataay a singkic. . teban nu singkic u singkic a nika pulungan nu si-paw, itida i mutiyungay nu cancanan nu tebanay, ngangangan mikawaway u misasiduma ( patudut, miciwkin, mikawaw) namaka udipay nu icuwacuwaay a nikataynian, mamilawpes atu miput tu udip nu makacuwaay a nikawawan, sakatahekal nu tanengay. . siukakay nu aadupan, teban a singkic itida i nikuda nu kululan, pasu punu atu duus, ipunu' i labu nu punuan, duus itida i teban nu ukak, satahap nu tangah midiputay tu punu', kulul nu ukak midiput tu duus.i nai'ay nu kululan nu aadupan mahida u mamulmulay nu aadupan atu cilekay sa, angangangan pasu biliay nu singkican a singkic nu batacan. . tademaw nu cun-su-singkic papatidengan u sakalibutan u sakapahay, picedekan u punu' pankiw mali a bangesan nu satalakaway a nikalahatan, malasingkic nu sakakaay atu satalakaway, mihusiw tu udiudipan nu sakatacuwacuwa a misungaay tu kawawan, atu ci-ti atu hekalay a milecad atu misasudanay. . miduhepit i sinkicu a si-paw u cun-su-singkic atu liwilw singkican a " caayay nu fei-sen-cin-yun-sipaw", caay ka sasuala tu dingkian. yadah ku nuheni, sakay udipan mahida tu, u singkic patideng patahekal atu sapidiputaw, itini i liwliw singkican mala suy-caw. . itini i teban nu sikicean, miduhepitay i singkican a si-paw pasu kua-tu-cia-ce-si-paw, sin-sen- cia-ce-si-paw,se-kun-si-paw atu seaw-cia-ce-si-paw, i liwliw nu singkic, miduhepitay i singkican a si-paw pasuse-wan-si-paw atu uy-sin-si-paw. malasepat ku a angangangan, (1) miliwliw tu singkican tida satu, (2) pawsa tu iyu atu yun i singkicean, (3) uynian a sikican atu duma a singkican caay ka lalitemuh, (4) milawpes tu itidaay tu mamiasik tu mapatayay a singkican. masasupaayaw ku singkic, tu-cu' malalitin atu muhanhan tu sakay udiudipan. . saan ku tademaw u miduhepit i sinkicu si-paw mikisen-cin-yun a nisausian 10:1, nika ayda a nipikinkiwan nipatahekalan mikisaba tu 1:1 a siwkian. namahida miduhepit i sinkicu si-paw idaw ku yadahay a si-paw yadahay atu kakakulian, ina miduhepit i sinkicu si-paw taneng misayadah patahekal atu mikuli tu sing-kic muculil. namahida, taneng ku nuheni macayat tu nidatengan a misingan atu misatanektek. miduhepit i sinkicu si-paw u mikinkiway tu imelangay a sitangahay a tademaw ci Lu-taw-hu. Fie-e-saw mikilim tu i punuay masaatiladay henay i tida i 1856 mihcaan makaadih. ya sasakamuen namaka Si-la a kamuan γλία atu γλοία "miduhepitay ", patucek tu nuhenian i tawya a nika tinengan u namaka singkiceay a nulian. . singkic itida i liklik nu singkican namaka nikabaludan a masakaput nu mabaluday, nu cacayay a singkican taneng miala tu cacay hatu yadahay nu singkican nikabalud, hekal nu singkican idaw ku mitabuay tu singkican, ilabu idaw ku singkic nu duhepicay sakalaliyas tu nika baludan. singkic masatawasiay u singkic mamibetas a masapucuay, ina masamibetasay masapucuay ihekalay matabuay nu miduhepit i sinkicu, mamidiput atu mamiputay. sisa inasingkic taneng patahekal tu nitungihan malucek namaka aadupan nu udip patayda i dumaan a udipan, kya taneng idaw ku mamiucul atu sasakawawan. anuhidan tu sakakawawan, u singkic taneng makakenih tu micumuday a singkic, tahekalay a singkic atu kapulungan nu singkic. anu hidan u nikitidaan, u singkic nu tademaw nikakenihan idaw ku punuay a singkic atu kululay a singkic. . sakay mata a singkic u sakatusa nu sabaw tusa nu punu'a singkic, bangu 11, nu mata a singkic a puu' nu si-paw nipatahekalan u masatawasiay nu singkic a nikapulungan, kalingatuan u mata nu mapucuay, i labu nu mataan pasayda i nikuda muculil, mitusul tu singkic nu mata micumud i taban, saluimeng sat u masacipaay nu ayawan. II, .

== midohepit i sinkico a gang神經膠質瘤 == midohepit i sinkico a gang, o teban no singkico a lebawa no imelang, namaka sinkic sinoliay no si-paw a nikasomad no adada. midohepit i singkico a gang hina tahekal i tangah " pangangan han to tangah midohepit i sinkico a gang, nika tahekal i domaan no singkicoan, mahida o namaka mataay a singkic. . teban no singkic o singkic a nika polongan no si-paw, itida i motiyongay no cancanan no tebanay, ngangangan mikawaway o misasidoma ( patodot, miciwkin, mikawaw) namaka odipay no icowacowaay a nikataynian, mamilawpes ato mipot to odip no makacowaay a nikawawan, sakatahekal no tanengay. . siokakay no aadopan, teban a singkic itida i nikoda no kololan, paso pono ato doos, ipono' i labo no ponoan, doos itida i teban no okak, satahap no tangah midipotay to pono', kolol no okak midipot to doos.i nai'ay no kololan no aadopan mahida o mamolmolay no aadopan ato cilekay sa, angangangan paso biliay no singkican a singkic no batacan. . tademaw no con-so-singkic papatidengan o sakalibotan o sakapahay, picedekan o pono' pankiw mali a bangesan no satalakaway a nikalahatan, malasingkic no sakakaay ato satalakaway, mihosiw to odiodipan no sakatacowacowa a misongaay to kawawan, ato ci-ti ato hekalay a milecad ato misasodanay. . midohepit i sinkico a si-paw o con-so-singkic ato liwilw singkican a " caayay no fei-sen-cin-yon-sipaw", caay ka sasoala to dingkian. yadah ko noheni, sakay odipan mahida to, o singkic patideng patahekal ato sapidipotaw, itini i liwliw singkican mala soy-caw. . itini i teban no sikicean, midohepitay i singkican a si-paw paso koa-to-cia-ce-si-paw, sin-sen- cia-ce-si-paw,se-kon-si-paw ato seaw-cia-ce-si-paw, i liwliw no singkic, midohepitay i singkican a si-paw pasose-wan-si-paw ato oy-sin-si-paw. malasepat ko a angangangan, (1) miliwliw to singkican tida sato, (2) pawsa to iyo ato yon i singkicean, (3) oynian a sikican ato doma a singkican caay ka lalitemoh, (4) milawpes to itidaay to mamiasik to mapatayay a singkican. masasopaayaw ko singkic, to-co' malalitin ato mohanhan to sakay odiodipan. . saan ko tademaw o midohepit i sinkico si-paw mikisen-cin-yon a nisaosian 10:1, nika ayda a nipikinkiwan nipatahekalan mikisaba to 1:1 a siwkian. namahida midohepit i sinkico si-paw idaw ko yadahay a si-paw yadahay ato kakakolian, ina midohepit i sinkico si-paw taneng misayadah patahekal ato mikoli to sing-kic mocolil. namahida, taneng ko noheni macayat to nidatengan a misingan ato misatanektek. midohepit i sinkico si-paw o mikinkiway to imelangay a sitangahay a tademaw ci Lo-taw-ho. Fie-e-saw mikilim to i ponoay masaatiladay henay i tida i 1856 mihcaan makaadih. ya sasakamoen namaka Si-la a kamoan γλία ato γλοία "midohepitay ", patocek to nohenian i tawya a nika tinengan o namaka singkiceay a nolian. . singkic itida i liklik no singkican namaka nikabalodan a masakapot no mabaloday, no cacayay a singkican taneng miala to cacay hato yadahay no singkican nikabalod, hekal no singkican idaw ko mitaboay to singkican, ilabo idaw ko singkic no dohepicay sakalaliyas to nika balodan. singkic masatawasiay o singkic mamibetas a masapocoay, ina masamibetasay masapocoay ihekalay mataboay no midohepit i sinkico, mamidipot ato mamipotay. sisa inasingkic taneng patahekal to nitongihan malocek namaka aadopan no odip patayda i domaan a odipan, kya taneng idaw ko mamiocol ato sasakawawan. anohidan to sakakawawan, o singkic taneng makakenih to micomoday a singkic, tahekalay a singkic ato kapolongan no singkic. ano hidan o nikitidaan, o singkic no tademaw nikakenihan idaw ko ponoay a singkic ato kololay a singkic. . sakay mata a singkic o sakatosa no sabaw tosa no pono'a singkic, bango 11, no mata a singkic a poo' no si-paw nipatahekalan o masatawasiay no singkic a nikapolongan, kalingatoan o mata no mapocoay, i labo no mataan pasayda i nikoda mocolil, mitosol to singkic no mata micomod i taban, saloimeng sat o masacipaay no ayawan. II, .
